title: Discovery
detail: This section is an important foundation for the whole software development lifecycle & this phase lets you know about the MVP's scope and gives you a UX roadmap & Figma designs for the first sprint. Being a leading development company, you will be recommended a technology stack or design in terms of (HLD).

title: Implementation
detail: This section is a pivotal part where software solutions, coding, configuration, development, and testing happen to provide a quality product. In this phase, DigiMark Developers do automation regression and unit tests, and ensure the complete process is done precisely. We collaborate with the clients during the process and guarantee the best quality solutions and expectations.

title: First release
detail: This depicts an important milestone in the development of the lifecycle. MVP scope gets tested & final confirmation is done in the production deployment. Afterward, complete MVP documentation is given.

title: Stabilization
detail: This is the final stage where the product is used by trustworthy users ensuring the success of the software product.. if required, we make the necessary changes so that the user experience can get much better and more attractive by optimizing performance and adding user feedback.
